title: Pittsburgh market has seen the most ads in high-stakes Senate race

sentence: abc27 will also host a debate with the Democratic Party candidates for Senate on April 21 at 8 p.m. John Fetterman, Conor Lamb, and Malcolm Kenyatta have each committed to attend.
